# Robots.txt for Prismy.in - AI Translation Platform
# Generated by Phase 9.4: SEO Optimization

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Main pages - High priority for crawling
Allow: /
Allow: /enterprise
Allow: /pricing
Allow: /features
Allow: /workspace
Allow: /blog
Allow: /community
Allow: /documents

# Dashboard pages - Allow indexing but lower priority
Allow: /dashboard
Allow: /dashboard/analytics
Allow: /dashboard/history
Allow: /dashboard/settings
Allow: /dashboard/workflows
Allow: /dashboard/enterprise
Allow: /dashboard/enterprise/analytics
Allow: /dashboard/enterprise/insights

# API Documentation
Allow: /api-docs

# Block sensitive areas
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /dashboard/billing
Disallow: /dashboard/documents
Disallow: /dashboard/agents
Disallow: /auth/
Disallow: /payment/
Disallow: /invite/

# Block private/admin areas
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /.well-known/

# Allow static assets
Allow: /icons/
Allow: /images/
Allow: /favicon.ico
Allow: /manifest.json
Allow: /sw.js

# Specific bot instructions
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

Allow: /
